=== About Me ===

Ubuntu user since 13.04. Community member at Ask Ubuntu. Primarily work with text processing , general scripting, and desktop enhancement questions. Main programming languages: shell, Python, some Perl, some C. Electrical engineering student at Metropolitan State University of Denver, with concentration in computer engineering. Native speaker of Russian and Ukrainian, speak Mandarin Chinese and English with moderate working proficiency.
